title:
Integral representation for a relaxed optimal design problem for
  non-simple grade two materials
authors: Ana Cristina Barroso and Elvira Zappale
abstract:
A measure representation result for a functional modelling optimal design
problems for plastic deformations, under linear growth conditions, is obtained.
  Departing from an energy with a bulk term depending on the deformation
gradient and its derivatives, as well as a perimeter term, the functional in
question corresponds to the relaxation of this energy with respect to a pair
$(\chi,u)$, where $\chi$ is the characteristic function of a set of finite
perimeter and $u$ is a function of bounded hessian.
